column1: Smoque BBQ////Let's get down to brass tacks.  I mean
column3: i've tried a large variety of things on the menu.  Brisket
column7: and coleslaw.  I wouldn't dare say that any of these items are horrendous or poorly prepared.  Actually
column9: albeit incredulously rich.  The ribs and links were also pretty tasty.  Nonetheless
column10: I really have failed to have my mind blown as many reviewers on yelp have.  Like I said
column11: I would consider all of their smoked meats good
column12: but nothing special.  As for the sides
column13: I will say the mac is delicious.
